title: Building an MVP in 5 Days
desc: A step-by-step guide on how to ship your first product quickly.
content: In this article, we walk through how to build a minimal viable product (MVP) in under a week, focusing on speed and validation rather than perfection.

title: Why Tailwind CSS Speeds Up Development
desc: Exploring how Tailwind can help developers style faster with utility classes.
content: Tailwind CSS provides a set of utility-first classes that allow developers to build modern UIs without writing custom CSS. This post discusses why it’s efficient for small teams.

title: React vs. Next.js: Which Should You Choose?
desc: Comparing React and Next.js for building modern web apps.
content: React is a library for building UIs, while Next.js is a framework built on top of React. We explore the differences and when to choose one over the other.

title: The Importance of User Feedback in MVPs
desc: How collecting early feedback can make or break your startup.
content: Early-stage products benefit the most from real user input. Learn practical strategies to gather and act on feedback quickly.

title: Using PostgreSQL for Modern Web Apps
desc: Why PostgreSQL is a solid choice for startups and production apps.
content: PostgreSQL is reliable, scalable, and has a strong ecosystem of tools. We explore why it’s favored by developers building data-heavy applications.

title: How to Deploy Next.js on Vercel
desc: A beginner-friendly guide to deploying your Next.js app live.
content: Vercel is the easiest way to deploy Next.js applications. In this guide, we walk you through deployment in under 10 minutes.

title: Best Free APIs for Hackathon Projects
desc: A curated list of APIs that can supercharge your hackathon projects.
content: Hackathons require speed and creativity. This list covers APIs that are free to use and integrate quickly, from maps to AI services.

title: Designing with Accessibility in Mind
desc: Why accessibility should be a priority, not an afterthought.
content: Accessible design benefits everyone. We cover key principles and simple techniques for making your web apps inclusive.

title: Integrating Maps with Leaflet.js
desc: A hands-on guide to adding interactive maps to your projects.
content: Leaflet.js makes it simple to add maps to any project. We demonstrate how to integrate it into a Next.js application.

title: Managing State in React Apps
desc: Different approaches to handle state in modern React applications.
content: From useState to Redux, there are multiple ways to manage state in React. This post compares options and when to use them.
